intro.body-text: Explore the most hassle-free rental process, unmatched market prices, and free on-site service.

plans.plan1Desc: Basic package that includes only the rental of an electric bicycle for a week.
plans.plan3Desc: Package that includes only the rental of an electric bicycle for no more than 3 days.
plans.plan4Desc: Package that includes only the rental of an electric bicycle for at least 3 days and no more than 14 days.

additions.addition1Desc: Additional battery for the standard package
additions.addition2Desc: You can rent an additional helmet for the electric bicycle.

aboutus.heading: ABOUT US
aboutus.text: We have been operating since 2022. We have our own service.

reviews.heading: OUR CUSTOMERS' REVIEWS
reviews.review1: Excellent bike rental. I have been using it for several months and have no complaints. I recommend it to everyone looking for bicycles.
reviews.review2: I work at Glovo on a regular bicycle and at best earn 150 złoty a day. On x2bike, I earned 265 złoty on the very first day and set it up as a scooter in the app. Very satisfied. Really good tool for earning.
reviews.review3: Everything was excellent, the processing was fast, used it for two weeks but returned due to personal circumstances. The bicycle is good, accelerates to 35-40 km/h on a flat road with one button, has suspension. There were no problems with the return. In the future, I will probably use their services again.
reviews.review4: Good service, bicycles in good condition. Very grateful, thank you!
reviews.review5: Impressed with their electric bicycles. As an experienced courier, I believe x2bike has the best electric bicycles in Warsaw.
reviews.review6: The bicycle is very smooth and faster than I expected! They helped me set up the subscription and were very friendly! I will definitely be making a lot of deliveries on this bicycle!

sign-up.reset-account-log-in: Don't worry, we will send you reset instructions.

FAQ.question1: How does the x2bike subscription work?
FAQ.question3: What is included in the subscription?
FAQ.question4: What to do if the e-bike is stolen?
FAQ.question5: My subscription has ended, how quickly do I need to return the e-bike?
FAQ.question6: Can I return the bike before the subscription ends?
FAQ.question7: How can I cancel the subscription?
FAQ.question9: What to do if my e-bike breaks down?
FAQ.question10: Is a deposit required to start the rental?
FAQ.question11: Where can I pick up the reserved e-bike?
FAQ.question13: How does the bike ownership program work?
FAQ.question18: What to do if my e-bike breaks down?
FAQ.question19: How to determine if the e-bike damage was caused by the user?
FAQ.answer1: You subscribe on the website, following our instructions. Then our manager contacts you to coordinate the details of the bike transfer. The subscription starts from the moment you receive the bike. You use it until you are tired of it. If you no longer need the bike, you can cancel the subscription and return the bike to our address.
FAQ.answer2:
Anyone with a valid ID, valid for the next three months, and who is 18 years and older can subscribe to rent an e-bike. You will also need:

- A debit/credit card in your name (cash or prepaid card payments are not accepted). In rare cases, a refundable deposit may be required.

We conduct a background check for all clients. In rare cases, a deposit may be required. The company also reserves the right to refuse rental if the client fails the verification.
FAQ.answer3: The subscription includes an e-bike, phone holder, charger, and lock.
FAQ.answer4: We strongly urge you to treat the e-bike as your own and take all necessary safety precautions. In case of theft, we charge you the amount specified in the transfer certificate and recommend contacting the police.
FAQ.answer5: After the subscription period ends, you must return the e-bike within 24 hours. After 24 hours, fines are charged for each day of delay.
FAQ.answer6: You can return the e-bike any day before the end of the subscription period. However, unused days of the paid subscription are not refunded.
FAQ.answer7: You can cancel your subscription on your own in your account. You can cancel the subscription any day before its end. At the same time, the e-bike can be used until the end of the paid period, regardless of the cancellation date.
FAQ.answer8: You need to return the bike no later than 24 hours after the end of the subscription period along with all additional accessories and other items rented from us. Upon return, our representative will check the condition of the e-bike and additional accessories for damage beyond normal wear and tear, and you will sign a return act.
FAQ.answer9: In case of mechanical problems with the e-bike, immediately stop using it and contact us to arrange a date and time for its replacement with a new one. Weekly subscription payments only cover normal wear and tear, and additional charges may apply in case of other types of damage.
FAQ.answer11: After confirming your registration on the website, e-bikes are issued at our service center at ul. Mesynska 17 in Warsaw.
FAQ.answer12: Your rental starts only after you receive the e-bike.
FAQ.answer13: If a client rents a bike for at least 12 months and makes timely payments for use, the bike becomes their property.
FAQ.answer18: In case of mechanical problems with the e-bike, immediately stop using it and contact us to arrange a date and time for its repair.
FAQ.answer19: Our team of experienced mechanics will conduct a thorough examination of the bike to determine its condition.
